description: 12 months of credit monitoring and credit report review service
24 months of comprehensive credit monitoring and fraud detection
Identity theft prevention tools and services including credit and identity monitoring
Credit freeze setup with all major credit bureaus (Equifax Experian TransUnion)
Fraud alert placement with major credit bureaus renewable annually
Legal consultation for identity theft or credit issues resulting from breach
Annual credit report review and analysis to identify fraud or unauthorized accounts
24/7 hotline for breach victims to report fraud or obtain mitigation information
Assistance restoring documents and establishing identity if stolen
Cost of notifying affected individuals and credit bureaus
